---
title: "Kings, Queens, and Princesses"
date: 2020-06-12
weight: 1
---
The numbers in this puzzle have a constraint I call anti-princess
Ordinary sudoku rules apply. In addition, the number in a box tells you the minimum diagonal distance between another of the same number
<a href="https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/?m=solve&&a=RZJdqoMxCET30mcf4k80WUvp/rdxdSZw4YMh5ThHkn6/P/n/PrqWxEc6VQ7SRJEuhQxxZEoiSwx5ZE9qyEVu/q5JXot9etivl7wt9puy34y9dsjbJe9Kzo397uQ86PHNPn++MJ7DORdBPt5ekfRFPf754rJ/8x58AW/7UE/e7ulu9Yy0GSQL/cDXujm1bcgnacfs0IpB2jBlWzG+DaLN8X1BJpdIBZmBstwoy4S9DKdyIMXbqARZvOuzsMvhi53iie91ef1XMXdZdh3Vd55y/he/Pw==">try it here</a>
